title: Due to popular demand: Here is a complete compilation of the apology video with a nice send-off!

author: UnionGloomy8226
text: 6 9s is actually not a sexual joke ore anything. The number of 9s actually signify the "availability" of a system. A system which is 99.9999% available is kinda the goal for any web scale development. You can only have a net downtime of 32 seconds in a year to achieve that.

author: Shad0WTF
text: Are you seriously that blind? If there were no jokes there, he'd just say six nines and move one. How the fuck are you defending the facial gestures and the finger pointing?

author: Guysmiley777
text: I honestly and truly think a lot of LTT superfans are on the spectrum.

author: ciaranpflanagan
text: This is a pretty unrealistic and expensive goal for any tech company. Their goal of 6 9s is purely for the comedic effect. Extremely distasteful comedic effect.
